game.name: 卡包修仙
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: "Cardpack Cultivation" is a roguelite cultivation sim where you play as a cultivator, and every run tells a new story.
game.shortDescriptionEn: "Cardpack Cultivation" is a roguelite cultivation sim where you play as a cultivator, and every run tells a new story.
